title: Low Oil Prices Accelerate Trouble For Venezuela
teaser: The drop in the price of oil might be having a positive effect on the disposable income of Americans, but for people who live in countries whose economies are dependent on the high price of oil it's a different story. Audie Cornish talks to Daniel Yergin, author of The Quest: Energy, Security and the Remaking of the Modern World
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
